00050 
00051   // Must be run before the lock for nonbacktrack.
00052 inline void TrailedMonotonicSet::lock(StateObj * _stateObj)
00053 {
00054     D_ASSERT(!locked);
00055     #ifndef NO_DEBUG
00056     locked=true;
00057     #endif
00058     
00059     stateObj=_stateObj;
00060     
00061     _max_undos=_size;
00062     
00063     _max_depth = _max_undos;             
00064     _local_depth = 0;
00065     
00066     _array = getMemory(stateObj).nonBackTrack().request_bytes(_size*sizeof(value_type)); 
00067     _undo_indexes = getMemory(stateObj).nonBackTrack().request_bytes(_max_depth*sizeof(int));
00068     
00069     _backtrack_depth_ptr = getMemory(stateObj).backTrack().request_bytes(sizeof(int));
00070     
00071     *((int*)_backtrack_depth_ptr.get_ptr()) = 0;
00072     
00073     #ifdef DEBUG_TMS
00074     cout << "initialising TrailedMonotonicSet with value of size= " << size << endl;
00075     // print_state();
00076     #endif
00077     
00078     for(int i=0; i< _size; i++) {
00079       array(i) = tms_in_set;
00080     };
00081 }
